data.name: Ultionus: A Tale of Petty Revenge Demo
data.detailed_description:
After a long day of saving the known Universe from monstrous threats, Galactic hero Serena S finds an insulting message in her Spacebook feed. This is obviously a cause to embark on a quest to punish the troll in question, who just happens to be The Space Prince himself - Chad Galactic!
This gameplay demo contains the opening 2 stages of the retail release.
data.about_the_game:
After a long day of saving the known Universe from monstrous threats, Galactic hero Serena S finds an insulting message in her Spacebook feed. This is obviously a cause to embark on a quest to punish the troll in question, who just happens to be The Space Prince himself - Chad Galactic!
This gameplay demo contains the opening 2 stages of the retail release.
data.short_description: Galactic hero Serena S doesn't take kindly to insults. Get angry, and jump'n'shoot your way to sweet, sweet revenge!

fullgame.name: Ultionus: A Tale of Petty Revenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Atom 230 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 945 Express
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Atom 230 1.6Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 945 Express
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Please note that game's protagonist, Serena S, wears an ill-fitting swimsuit throughout her entire adventure, and has a bit of a potty mouth during cutscene dialogue.
